trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_SEQ_00<tab>Esmour needs an exterminator at the Church of Saint Adama Landama.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_SEQ_01<tab>Corpses have drawn blowfly swarms to the vicinity of the church. Slay five of the swarms to keep them in check.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain five blowfly swarms. Report back to Esmour at the church.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_SEQ_03<tab>Esmour thanks you for having ensured the safety and well-being of the mourners who visit the church.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_ESMOUR_000_1<tab>You have troubled yourself to come all this way. I wonder if I might not trouble you a bit further.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_ESMOUR_000_2<tab>As you well know, we keep a lichyard here. The scent of death's decay draws blowfly swarms, which are as unclean as they are unwelcome.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_ESMOUR_000_3<tab>Slay five of these pestilent swarms, and the church will be in your debt.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_ESMOUR_000_10<tab>Thank you, friend. If the swarms were to spread their pestilence at the church unchecked, before long we would need to mourn the mourning.
TEXT_SUBWIL117_00626_ESMOUR_000_11<tab>For the time being, at least, the grieving can pray in peace for their dead to cross over safely. Thal bless you.
